intro: Dovea cylindrostachya, commonly known as the slender-stalked dovea, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its slender, cylindrical stems and small, opposite leaves. It produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers, which are typically arranged in dense inflorescences. Dovea cylindrostachya is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
